Les amandes sont une noix riche en vitamine E, en antioxydants, en graisses insatur√©es saines pour le cerveau et en de nombreux autres min√©raux. Dans cet article, je vais partager comment faire des amandes beurr√©es, croustillantes et caram√©lis√©es sans additifs artificiels ni conservateurs. Cela peut √™tre un go√ªter nutritif pour toute la famille ou un r√©gal pour les invit√©s. Et pas besoin de les acheter au march√© car la recette des amandes caram√©lis√©es est tr√®s facile √† r√©aliser !

INGR√âDIENTS :

  • 300g d‚Äôamandes non mond√©es
  • 50 g de beurre non sal√©
  • 50g de sucre
  • 1 cuill√®re √† caf√© de sel

PR√âPARATION :

√âtape 1 : Faites griller les amandes

  • Mettez les amandes dans une po√™le chauff√©e, maintenez le feu √† moyen doux et remuez constamment pour que les amandes soient cuites uniform√©ment, sans br√ªler les bords.
  • Astuce : Faire frire des amandes, c‚Äôest comme frire des cacahu√®tes, quand on entend le cr√©pitement, les amandes ont commenc√© √† cuire. √Ä ce stade, on √©teint le feu mais continuons √† remuer pendant encore 3 minutes afin que la partie la plus interne des amandes soit compl√®tement cuite.
  • Verser les amandes grill√©es sur une assiette.

√âtape #2 : M√©langer des amandes grill√©es avec des √©pices

  • Mettez le m√©lange pr√©par√© de beurre, de sucre et de sel dans une po√™le chaude sur la cuisini√®re. Remuez le m√©lange jusqu‚Äô√† ce qu‚Äôil fonde.
  • Mettez la plaque d‚Äôamandes cuites dans la po√™le, remuez rapidement et uniform√©ment jusqu‚Äô√† ce que le m√©lange ait un certain collant, puis √©teignez le feu.
  • Astuce : comme les amandes sont d√©j√† cuites et que les √©pices sont tr√®s inflammables, nous devons garder le feu doux.
  • √âtalez uniform√©ment le m√©lange d‚Äôamandes assaisonn√©es sur un grand plateau afin qu‚Äôaucune des amandes ne colle ensemble.
  • Attendez 2 minutes, tapotez doucement le plateau avec une spatule pour s√©parer les amandes du plateau.

√âtape #3 : D√©gustez des amandes caram√©lis√©es

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

item.title: HOME-MADE CARAMELIZED ALMONDS RECIPE
item.dc:creator: Lan Anh
item.description: Almonds are a nut rich in vitamin E, antioxidants, brain-healthy unsaturated fats and many other minerals. In this article, I will share how to make buttery, crispy, caramelized almonds without artificial additives and preservatives. This can be a nutritious snack for the whole family or…
item.content:encoded:
Almonds are a nut rich in vitamin E, antioxidants, brain-healthy unsaturated fats and many other minerals. In this article, I will share how to make buttery, crispy, caramelized almonds without artificial additives and preservatives. This can be a nutritious snack for the whole family or a treat for guests.

INGREDIENTS:

  • 300g unpeeled almonds
  • 50g unsalted butter
  • 50g sugar
  • 1 teaspoon salt

DIRECTIONS:

Step #1: Fry or roast the almonds

  • Put the almonds in a hot pan, keep the heat on medium low and stir constantly so that the almonds are cooked evenly, without burning the edges.
  • Tip: Frying almonds is like frying peanuts. When we hear the crackling sound, the almonds have begun to be cooked. At this point, we turn off the heat but continue to stir for another 3 minutes so that the innermost part of the almonds is completely cooked.
  • Pour the fried/ roasted almonds onto a plate.

Step #2: Mix fried almonds with spices

  • Put the prepared mixture of butter, sugar, and salt in a hot pan. Stir the mixture until it melts.
  • Put the fried almonds in the pan, stir quickly and evenly until the mixture has a certain stickiness, then turn off the heat.
  • Tip: because the almonds are already cooked and the spices are very flammable, we need to keep the heat low.
  • Spread the seasoned almond mixture evenly on a large tray so that none of the almonds stick together.
  • Wait 2 minutes, gently tap the tray with a spatula to separate the almonds from the tray.

Step #3: Enjoy caramelized almonds

  • The candied almonds themselves have a sweet and fatty taste, so we can enjoy these buttered almonds only or with yogurt, with fresh cheese or with fruits (avocado, banana‚Ä¶)

Small notes:

  • According to scientists, almonds contain a very high nutritional content, it‚Äôs advisable to eat 15‚Äì25 almonds every day.
  • We can also roast several batches of almonds at the same time, each batch of 200‚Äì300g and put them in a jar in a cool and dry place.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Well, this is my personal experience on how to make delicious, crispy, caramelized almonds that my whole family loves to snack with every afternoon. Hope you find it useful. See you soon with other recipes!
